message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product, and I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $115. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about $110? It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find this product to be a great value at that price.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $107.50?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your flexibility. However, $107.50 is still a bit too low for me. How about $112.50? This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident this product will be a great investment for you at this price.
I'm getting close to your asking price, but I'm still not comfortable going above $108. How about we meet in the middle again? $110.75?

Bob, I really appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. I'm going to stick with my last offer of $112.50. This is a fair price, and I'm confident you'll find this product to be a great value at that price.  I'm happy to keep discussing, but if you can't meet me there, I'm going to have to look for other buyers.
I understand you're sticking to your last offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $108. I'm willing to make one more attempt to meet in the middle. How about $110.25?
